detail_desc: High-waisted shorts in twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and a detachable tie belt.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with a pocket at the top and elastic straps with adjustable fasteners. Seam and belt loops at the waist, a press-stud at the sides and front pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).
High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with inset mesh sections at the hems. Wide waist panel containing a concealed key pocket.
Oversized T-shirt in soft, slub cotton jersey with low dropped shoulders, a decorative seam at the top of the front and at the back, and a ribbed neckline.
Jacket in washed, stretch denim with embroidery on the sleeves, a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Lined bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Wide shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
5-pocket trousers in stretch, supersoft twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, embroidery at the top and zip fly and button. Decorative seams on the back pockets and slim, straight legs.
Waistcoat in Oxford cotton with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with reflective print motifs and long, double sleeves in a contrasting colour. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, flap leg pockets and ribbed hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Soft, patterned smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6/7/8.
A-line top in soft slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and sewn-on chiffon bow at the top. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a small frill trim.
Straight-cut, relaxed-fit T-shirt in soft pima cotton jersey containing some silk.

Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with a printed and embroidered motif on the front, a fabric appliqué on one sleeve and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the front and at the crotch.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with wide, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and a straight-cut hem.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a relaxed fit with a round neck.
Fitted nursing dress in cotton-blend jersey with short sleeves and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
Fabric mule loafers with a metal decoration at the top. Imitation leather linings and insoles.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, gathers at the shoulders and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Two concealed buttons at the top, and a rounded hem.
Short, fitted skirt in imitation leather with decorative seams at the top. High waist with visible covered buttons at the top and a zip fly. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a small, sewn-on fabric label at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and an opening and ties at the back of the hem.
Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with short sleeves.
Short dress in a softly draping viscose weave. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.

Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a button placket and a braided, detachable belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Trainers in chambray and imitation suede with a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and two open front pockets. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Low crotch and tapered legs with gathered seams and a zip at the hems.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short, straight dress in an airy Tencel™ lyocell-blend weave with a high collar with a frill trim and covered buttons. Pin-tucks and an opening at the top and long, wide puff sleeves with a drawstring and flared cuffs. Seam at the hips with a wide, double-flounced skirt. Unlined.

Shorts in woven fabric with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a tongue and lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in fabric made from recycled polyester. Chunky, patterned soles. Block heels 7.5 cm.
Long-sleeved jersey tops in a soft cotton blend. Slim fit.

Sleeveless top in a slightly crinkled viscose weave. Narrow cut at the top with a small opening front and back and a button at the back of the neck. Spaghetti shoulder straps and a decorative pompom trim around the armholes.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
Blouse in an airy crêpe weave made from partly recycled polyester. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a V-neck opening with concealed buttons at the front and short, wide raglan sleeves. Lined front.
Pyjamas in soft, cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short dress in an airy, patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Fine-knit jumper in a cotton blend. Long sleeves with a flared flounce at the cuffs and narrow ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Pool shoes with a hook and loop fastener and embossed rubber soles.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Fitted top in a soft, textured knit with a turtle neck and short sleeves.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Lace dress with a pleated skirt, short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and concealed zip in the side. Lined.
A-line dress in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Long, pleated dress in satin with a sheen. Draped, wrapover top section, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side, seam under the bust and flared skirt. Lined.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Cotton slippers with elastication around the opening, terry linings and insoles and soft, imitation suede soles.

Sleeveless romper suits in soft organic cotton jersey with adjustable press-stud fastenings on the shoulders and a patch pocket at the top. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y) and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in a rib knit. Low-cut neckline with a twisted detail at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Ankle-length trousers in soft cotton twill. High paper bag waist with a detachable tie belt and elastication at the back, fake fly with decorative buttons, side pockets and tapered legs.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with lace trims, elasticated cuffs, a gathered seam at the hips and a gently flared skirt.

Set with a sleeveless top and pair of puff pants in an airy cotton weave. Top with buttons at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Puff pants with elastication and a frill-trim at the waist and around the hems.
Straight-cut top in soft viscose jersey with a round, beaded neckline and an opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Gently dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Ankle-length trousers in a patterned viscose weave with covered elastication and decorative ties at the waist, side pockets and side stripes.

Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a cotton weave with embroidery, tie-top shoulder straps and elastication at the top. 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a seam at the hem with a scalloped edge. Unlined.
Bucket bag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a drawstring at the top and one inner compartment. Size 12x28x30 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, button placket, gathers at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Two T-shirts in premium cotton jersey.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and straight legs with raw-edge hems.

Short dress in lightweight viscose twill with a sheen. A-line style with a high, smocked collar and decorative gathers at the top, an opening with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back and long balloon sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs.
Coat in a felted wool blend with a shawl collar, detachable tie belt at the waist, concealed pockets in the side seams and no buttons. Unlined.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a kangaroo pocket and wrapover, jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Strapless balconette bra in jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Underwired, padded cups to lift and shape the bust and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Slightly longer at the back.
